description: Styles for the two-player Tic Tac Toe game frontend, including layout and theme management.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container class for the application, centers content and applies background color and text color styles.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Displays the current status of the game with specific font sizes and primary color.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid layout for game squares with responsive column configuration.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual game squares including sizing, border, color and hover effects.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the reset button used to restart the game, including hover effects.

classes.name: move-history
classes.description: Styles for displaying the history of moves made in the game.

classes.name: move-list
classes.description: Styled list for displaying individual move history items.
